statements: SELECT id, customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM pricing_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, price, product_id, discount, id FROM pricing_information WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT product_id, discount, customer_id, price, id FROM pricing_information WHERE product_id = 20;
SELECT price, id, customer_id, product_id, discount FROM pricing_information WHERE id = 5;
SELECT discount, id, customer_id, product_id, price FROM pricing_information WHERE customer_id = 15;
SELECT * FROM pricing_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, price, discount FROM pricing_information WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT product_id, price FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM pricing_information WHERE price < 100 AND discount > 0 ORDER BY discount ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_information WHERE discount IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id, product_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM customer_pricing;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM customer_pricing WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_pricing WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_info;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM customer_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_pricing WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount FROM customer_pricing WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, category FROM customer_pricing cp JOIN product_info pi ON cp.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, description FROM customer_pricing cp JOIN product_info pi ON cp.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE discount >= 0.2 AND cp.price < 500 ORDER BY cp.price ASC;

SELECT customer_id, product_name, price, (price - (price * discount)) AS discounted_price FROM customer_pricing cp JOIN product_info pi ON cp.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE customer_id = 3 AND category='Clothing';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT discount_code, discount_amount FROM Discounts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers JOIN Discounts ON Customers.customer_id = Discounts.discount_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT discount_code, discount_amount FROM Discounts WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, product_name, discount_code FROM Customers JOIN Products ON Customers.customer_id = Products.product_id JOIN Discounts ON Products.product_id = Discounts.discount_id ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, price, discount_id FROM customer_product_pricing WHERE discount_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM discounts ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT discount_id, discount_amount FROM discounts WHERE discount_amount > 0.5;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN customer_product_pricing ON customers.customer_id = customer_product_pricing.customer_id JOIN products ON customer_product_pricing.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price, discount_amount FROM customers JOIN customer_product_pricing ON customers.customer_id = customer_product_pricing.customer_id JOIN products ON customer_product_pricing.product_id = products.product_id JOIN discounts ON customer_product_pricing.discount_id = discounts.discount_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_purchases ON customers.customer_id = customer_purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM customers c JOIN customer_purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT p.product_name, d.discount_amount, pr.product_price FROM products p LEFT JOIN discounts d ON p.product_id = d.product_id INNER JOIN products pr ON d.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.customer_name, c.customer_email, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000;
